content: fffffeeeeelllllttttteeeeeddddd gggggrrrrraaaaannnnnnnnnnyyyyy sssssllllliiiiippppppppppeeeeerrrrrsssss yarn wool yarn 3 strands - 15g of color a dark grey - 25g of color b rust - 50g / 90g of color c natural hook h 5mm gauge 1 granny square before felting 4x4 10x10cm / 4¾ x 4¾ 12x12cm size women s / men s stitches and abbreviations chain chain single_crochet single_crochet st stitch double_crochet double_crochet gggggrrrrraaaaannnnnnnnnnyyyyy sssssqqqqquuuuuaaaaarrrrreeeee make 8 with hook h 5mm and color a chain 6 and join with a slip stitch to make a ring round 1 loosely chain 2 2dc around the ring chain 2 * 3 double_crochet round the ring chain 2 * repeat from * to * 2 times join round with a slip_stitch in 2nd st of turning chain put the hook through the top of 2nd double_crochet in the round cut the yarn and draw through yarn of color b round 2 slip_stitch into chain 2 space of previous round loosely chain 2 2 double_crochet chain 2 3 double_crochet in chain 2 space chain 1 * 3 double_crochet chain 2 3 double_crochet in next chain 2 space chain 1 * repeat from * to * 2 times join round with a slip_stitch in 2nd st of turning chain put the hook through the top of 2nd double_crochet in the round cut the yarn and draw through yarn of color c round 3 slip_stitch into chain 2 space of previous round loosely chain 2 2 double_crochet chain 2 3 double_crochet in chain 2 space chain 1 3 double_crochet in next chain 1 space chain 1 * 3 double_crochet chain 2 3 double_crochet in next chain 2 space chain 1 3 double_crochet in next chain 1 space chain 1 * repeat from * to * 2 times join round with a slip_stitch in 2nd st of turning chain fasten_off women s size only round 4 men s size only crochet one more round in the same way as the previous rounds but without changing color before fastening off sssssiiiiinnnnngggggllllleeeee cccccooooolllllooooorrrrr sssssqqqqquuuuuaaaaarrrrreeeee make 4 with hook h 5mm and color c chain 6 and join with a slip_stitch to make a ring round 1 loosely chain 2 2dc around the ring chain 2 * 3 double_crochet round the ring chain 2 * repeat from * to * 2 times join round with a slip_stitch in 2nd st of turning chain slip stich into the top of next 2 st round 2 slip_stitch into chain 2 space of previous round loosely chain 2 1 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet in chain 2 space * 1 double_crochet in each st until next chain 2 space 2 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet in chain 2 space * repeat from * to * 2 times 1 double_crochet in each st until end of round join round with a slip_stitch in 2nd st of turning chain slip stich into the top of next st round 3 repeat round 2 fasten_off women s size only round 4 men s size only repeat round 3
